data.title: Helmi
data.meta_description: We connect investors with high-potential companies across all stages, providing tailored solutions for Equity, Debt, and M&A.
data.text:
.dark{ .navigationbar { background-color: var(--monocrome-1000); // border-bottom: 1px solid var(--monocrome-900); border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; box-shadow: 0px 10px 44px 0px rgba(0,0,0,1); } .menu-icon_line-top-4, .menu-icon_line-middle-4, .menu-icon_line-bottom-4{ background-color: var(--monocrome-200); } .uui-navbar07_logo-link-2-copy-copy, .uui-navbar07_logo-link-2-copy { .heading-10{ color: var(--monocrome-200); } } .uui-button-tertiary-gray-3 { background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid var(--monocrome-300); .text-block-65{ color: var(--monocrome-300); } &:hover{ background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid var(--monocrome-300); .text-block-65{ color: var(--monocrome-300); } } } .text-span-2, .text-span-1, .uui-dropdown-icon-3{ color: var(--monocrome-300); } .uui-navbar07_menu-2 { background-color: var(--monocrome-1000) } .uui-navbar07_dropdown-link-2:hover { // opacity: 0.7; // border: 1px solid var(--primary-600); background-color: var(--monocrome-800); } .uui-navbar07_dropdown-list-3 { background-color: var(--monocrome-900); border: 1px solid var(--monocrome-900); } .uui-navbar07_dropdown-link-2 { background-color: transparent; animation: all 200ms ease-in; border: 1px solid var(--monocrome-900); .uui-navbar07_item-heading-2 { color: var(--monocrome-100); } .uui-text-size-small-4 { color: var(--monocrome-500); } } .uui-button-secondary-gray-4 { background: transparent; .text-block-72 { color: white; } } .uui-button-7 { background: white; color: var(--monocrome-1000); border-color: transparent; } } .transparent { .navigationbar { position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; right: 0px; background-color: transparent; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,1); } .uui-button-tertiary-gray-3 { background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid var(--monocrome-300); .text-block-65{ color: var(--monocrome-300); } &:hover{ background-color: transparent; border: 1px solid var(--monocrome-300); .text-block-65{ color: var(--monocrome-300); } } } .menu-icon_line-top-4, .menu-icon_line-middle-4, .menu-icon_line-bottom-4{ background-color: var(--monocrome-200); } .uui-navbar07_logo-link-2-copy-copy, .uui-navbar07_logo-link-2-copy { .heading-10{ color: var(--monocrome-200); } } .text-span-2, .text-span-1, .uui-dropdown-icon-3{ color: var(--monocrome-300); } .uui-navbar07_menu-2 { background-color: transparent; } .uui-button-secondary-gray-4 { background: transparent; .text-block-72 { color: white; } } .uui-button-7 { background: white; color: var(--monocrome-1000); border-color: transparent; } @media (max-width: 990px) { .uui-navbar07_menu-2 { background-color: var(--monocrome-950); } } }

Latest posts

Our insights

The research you need to understand emerging markets.

July 19, 2024

Week 29, 2024 - Latin America

As the digital revolution continues to reshape global economies, the gig economy has emerged as a powerful force, particularly in Latin America. Characterized by short-term contracts and freelance work, the gig economy offers flexibility and new income opportunities for millions of workers. Often referred to as a "white-collar...

Read post

July 18, 2024

Proptech Market Potential in Latin America

Despite traditional sectors still dominating, proptech in Latin America is witnessing a growth trajectory. The region's burgeoning middle class, coupled with urbanization trends and technological advancement, are fostering a favourable environment for proptech expansion. Proptech solutions are having a profound socioeconomic impact...

Read post

July 15, 2024

Foreign Direct Investment Trends in Latin America

The World Investment Report 2024 highlights that Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) to Latin America and the Caribbean slightly declined by 1% to $193 billion in 2023, maintaining relative stability amid global economic fluctuations. FDI refers to an investment made by an entity or investor from one country into a business or project...

Read post
